files.description: CLI script that reads a DOI list, queries Unpaywall and Crossref plus repository URL heuristics, records each retrieval attempt with outcomes, and writes structured JSONL/CSV logs including source, URL, license/PD status when available, and failure reasons.
HTTP client utilities for rate-limited requests, retries, timeouts, user-agent/email handling, and consistent error normalization for external APIs.
Source adapters implementing Unpaywall and Crossref querying plus repository/landing-page heuristics and normalization into a common attempt/result schema.
Shared dataclasses and serialization helpers defining the structured log schema for attempts, results, license fields, and failure codes.
Utility functions for DOI parsing/normalization, CSV/JSONL writing, safe filename handling, and lightweight URL/host heuristics.
Usage documentation describing inputs, options, output formats, fields in the logs, and examples for running the DOI retrieval CLI tool.
Self-contained tests covering DOI normalization, schema serialization, source adapter parsing with mocked HTTP responses, and CSV/JSONL output generation.

missionDescription: Build a script in /outputs/tools that takes a DOI list, queries a small set of sources (e.g., Unpaywall/Crossref + repository heuristics), records retrieval attempts, and outputs structured logs (JSON/CSV) including source, URL, license/PD status when available, and failure reasons.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
